ModMetaData.name: Vault Suit
ModMetaData.author: MilkyTM,ireth92
ModMetaData.description: Allows the fitting and creation of the Vault Dweller suit from the Fallout Series. This mod used the Beautiful Bodies template to quickly make this mod. Most of the credit goes towards Ireth92. So i've added him to the author list as a Courtesy towards their hardwork. You can find the Beautiful Bodies Mod here -https://rimworldbase.com/beautiful-bodies-mod
